channel.title: Azure on TechBlog about OpenShift/Ansible/Satellite and much more
channel.description: Recent content in Azure on TechBlog about OpenShift/Ansible/Satellite and much more

item.title: Ansible - Azure Resource Manager Example
item.description: Using Ansible Resource Manager with an ARM template and a simple Ansible playbook to deploy a Virtual Machine with Disk, virtual network, public IP and so on.

item.title: YAUB Yet Another Useless Blog
item.description: Welcome to YAUB - Yet Another Useless Blog The articles in this blog shall help to easily tests and understand specific issues so they can be reproduced and tested on local environments. You can find the most recent posts on this site or walk through the different categories via the left navigation.
